item.title: Monitoring Dashboards - Status
item.description: Let’s talk about dashboards, shall we? It’s not uncommon in my work to work on Monitoring or Observability problems. A team or multiple teams deploy their applications in one of the environments, we can assume production, and they want to know how the System behaves.
